title: The Hartwell Chronicles
description: Just when Victoria Hartwell believed that her best friend Tyler Locklear might be her soulmate, she’s sent away to her Abuela’s house in the mountains of Asheville, NC. Stumbling upon her deceased grandfather’s basement, she discovers he left a legacy of exorcisms protecting the world from evil. Together, with a team of paranormal investigators, Victoria and Tyler must defeat the demons lurking in the shadows. Will this tear them apart or bring them closer? Can they master the skills needed to banish the darkness? Will she be able to save her sister’s soul before it’s too late? Will her grandfather's fate be her own or will faith be enough to save them?
author: Jen Lowry
